entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 08:29 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.8°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Taloyoak Airport 10:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
Condition: Ice Crystals
Temperature: -41.8°C
Pressure: 101.2 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 64 %
Wind Chill: -45
Dewpoint: -46.0°C
Wind: N 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 42.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Ice fog patches dissipating this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 42. Wind chill near minus 55. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few clouds. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h overnight. Temperature rising to minus 36 by morning. Wind chill minus 55 this evening and minus 49 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 34.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 34. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 09:00 AM MST Tuesday 21 February 2023
